mapper.select: SELECT c.cust_nm, rcd.paid_in_rounds, rcd.payment_amount, rcd.penalty_fee, rcd.monthly_payment_date, rcd.payment_status, rcd.unpaid_status FROM rental_contract_details rcd inner join payment p on rcd.rental_contract_no = p.rental_contract_no inner join customer c on rcd.cust_id = c.cust_id WHERE rcd.unpaid_status = #{unpaidStatus} and rcd.rental_contract_no = #{rentalContractNo} group by rcd.monthly_payment_date order by rcd.paid_in_rounds
